title: KR-völlur
text:
KR-völlur is a football <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Reykjav%C3%ADk">Reykjavík</a>, <a href="Iceland">Iceland</a>.
It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and has been the home stadium of <a href="Knattspyrnuf%C3%A9lag%20Reykjav%C3%ADkur">Knattspyrnufélag Reykjavíkur</a> since 1984. The stadium holds about 2,700 people and is located at Kaplaskjólsvegur in West Reykjavík.
